item.title: FromSql: Writing SQL Like a Boss in EF Core - Chris Woody Woodruff
item.description: So, you’ve embraced Entity Framework Core, and life’s been good. No more handcrafting SQL for every little query. But what happens when EF Core’s LINQ magic isn’t entirely cutting it? Maybe you need something specific, like a stored procedure or a complex SQL query that LINQ doesn’t handle elegantly. That’s where FromSql swoops in to save the day.

item.title: From Empty Chassis to Full System: My eBay PDP-11/73 Rebuild Adventure
item.description:
Join me as I rebuild a vintage PDP-11/73 from a bare DEC chassis, step by step. In this episode, I install a QBUS CPU card, two PMI memory boards (for a full 4MB), and interface with RQDX3 and M3104 serial boards to bring everything online. I’ll show how I tackled slot configurations, DMA bus grants, and the magic of the QBone for emulating boot media. We’ll format a classic DEC hard drive, then load XXDP diagnostics, and prep the system for BSD or RT-11. If you’re into retro computing, DEC hardware, or PDP-11 restorations, this is your backstage pass to a full rebuild—from backplane setup to kernel tweaks!
Free Sample of my Book on the Spectrum: https://amzn.to/3zBinWM
Watch ShopTalk Now on Dave's Attic: https://youtu.be/5Emgx0lhllE
Follow me on X: https://x.com/davepl1968 Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/davepl
item.author: (Dave's Garage)

item.title: The Microsoft 365 Copilot launch was a total disaster
item.description: At the start of the New Year, with no warning, Microsoft gives its flagship productivity app a name change and a huge price increase. Why would the company make this mess? I asked Copilot, who explained it very well.
